description: This file defines a Python test case class 'OESDKExtTestCase' which extends 'OESDKTestCase' for testing SDK extensions in the OpenEmbedded build environment. It includes a method '_run' that executes commands within a modified environment to avoid contamination from certain paths.

classes.name: OESDKExtTestCase
classes.description: A subclass of OESDKTestCase for testing SDK extension commands, with an overridden '_run' method to set up a safe environment for command execution.

methods.name: _run(self, cmd)
methods.description: Executes a shell command within an environment that excludes specific paths ('bitbake/bin' and 'poky/scripts') to prevent contamination, using the SDK environment variables.
